uvi.description:
crypto: aesni - xts_crypt() return if walk.nbytes is 0

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.14.10 by commit 38c84dfafed5b1193d083e0121ccd985ce5f5bdc. For more details please see the references link.
